com.google.actions.api

Class DefaultApp

  • com.google.actions.api.DefaultApp
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    App
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ActionsSdkApp, DialogflowApp

    public class DefaultApp
implements App

    Default implementation of an Actions App. This class provides most of the functionality of an App such as request parsing and routing.

        headers - Map containing metadata, usually from the HTTP request headers.
